Sentencas: This paper addresses a novel hunger games search (HGS) based on specular reflection-based learning (SRL) and dynamic quasi-opposition-based learning (DQOL), named HGS_RQ, for improving the optimization performance of the classical HGS while dealing with load frequency control task.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: By these learnings, a fitter solution can be generated whether by SRL or DQOL and therefore, the quality of the best solution can be refined.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: The effectiveness of the proposed HGS_RQ is demonstrated and validated on two-area interconnected power system with considering nonlinearity effect of governor dead band.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: Additional supplementary controller is proposed to reinforce frequency regulation through solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: The objective function is adapted to minimize the integral time absolute error in frequency deviations and tie line power.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: The efficacy and superiority are affirmed by the comparisons with some of prominent recent methods.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: It can be noted that the adequate response is proved, since the maximum frequency deviation is 0.088 Hz, the settling time is about 2 s, and the steady-state frequency change is zero in the two areas.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: On the other hand, there is a significant reduction in tie line power transient response with maximum deviation of 1.318% for the studied cases.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search

Sentencas: Furthermore, the statistical measures and analysis of variance test are analyzed to exhibit the superior performance of the HGS_RQ in terms of accuracy and reliability.
Titulo: Frequency control of hybrid microgrid comprising solid oxide fuel cell using hunger games search
